Package niagara.utils

Interface Summary
Arithmetics  
SerializableToXML An interface for structures that can be serialized to XML format
 

Class Summary

AttrNameComparator

BooleanHolder A class to hold a boolean value.
CPUTimer  
CtrlFlags CtrlFlags is a class just to keep track of names and values of control messages which are passed up and downstream during query processing.
CtrlSig  
CUtil The CUtil class has some static methods for doing utility stuff to trees, such as pruning the empty node that are present in trees produced by the old parser.
DOMHelper  
DuplicateHashtable This class provides a hash table implementation in which many objects can be added with the same key.
IntegerAttr  
JProf  
LongAttr  
MailboxFlag A mechanism for notifying a single consumer thread when one or more producer threads has produced something.

Tuple  
TuplePage A TuplePage is (surprise) a page of tuple objects.

Exception Summary
EOSException A EOSException is thrown to indicate End Of Stream
OperatorDoneException OperatorDoneException is thrown when an operator is done.
ParseException ParseException An error generated during by the parsing of an xml file
PEException PEException A Programming Error Exception - to be thrown when there is a programming error detected.
ShutdownException ShutdownException is thrown when a SHUTDOWN message is received on a stream - should propagate all the way up to PhysicalOperator.
UnrecoverableException UnrecoverableExceptin A UnrecoverableException - to be thrown when an error occurs which the server can not recover from.
